SamPy.astronomy.conversions.comovingVolume¶

SamPy.astronomy.conversions.comovingVolume(arcmin2, zmin, zmax, H0=70, WM=0.28)¶

Calculates the comoving volume between two redshifts when the sky survey has covered region.

Parameters:
  • arcmin2 – area on the sky in
  • zmin – redshift of the front part of the volume
  • zmax – redshift of the back part of the volume
  • H0 – Value of the Hubble constant
  • WM – Value of the mass density
Returns:

comoving volume between zmin and zmax of arcmin2 solid angle in Mpc**3
